newsitem.title: USA: Vimpel stake held by Soros group.
newsitem.headline: Vimpel stake held by Soros group.

text.p: A group led by U.S. investor George Soros said Monday it holds a 7.74 percent stake in Vimpel-Communications (Open Joint Stock Co) or 1,492,875 common shares.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include the purchase of 614,000 common shares on January 16 at price of $38.67 per share.
The group acquired the stake for investment purposes, the filing said.
The Moscow mobile telephone firm first begain trading on November 14, 1996 as the first Russian company to trade on the New York Stock Exchange.
